verses.roman:
tribhuvana-madhye aiche haya kon dhīra
ye tomāra māyā-nāṭe ha-ibeka sthira

synonyms: tri-bhuvana-madhye—within the three worlds; aiche—so much; haya—there is; kon—who; dhīra—patient; ye—who; tomāra—Your; māyā-nāṭe—in the manipulation of different energies; ha-ibeka—will be; sthira—steady.
translation: "Within these three worlds who is so undisturbed that he can remain steady as You manipulate Your different energies?
